stories.title: Core Regex Extraction Infrastructure
stories.description: Add error_pattern/warning_pattern to tool-registry.yaml for common tools (eslint, tsc, vitest). Update ToolchainService to extract errors/warnings using regex. Enhance validation-results.json structure with counts and lists. Add smoke tests for regex extraction.
stories.value: Developers get structured validation data in JSON (can be used by scripts/tools)
stories.testable: Can verify JSON contains errorCount, errors[], warnings[]
stories.shippable: Yes - JSON is enhanced, existing workflows still work with old format

stories.title: Slash Command Integration
stories.description: Update /harden command to read validation-results.json instead of quality-checks.md. Update /ship command to use JSON for quality gates. Implement dynamic tool evaluation (all tools, not predetermined list). Add integration tests for quality gate blocking.
stories.value: Users get improved /harden and /ship workflows with dynamic quality gates
stories.testable: Can verify quality gates block on errors, allow warnings
stories.shippable: Yes - workflows use new JSON format

stories.title: Cleanup and Documentation
stories.description: Remove quality-checks.md generation code. Update documentation. Add pattern customization examples. Migration guide for existing features.
stories.value: Clean codebase, clear documentation for users
stories.testable: Can verify quality-checks.md is not generated
stories.shippable: Yes - legacy code removed, docs updated
